Introduction

The order of operations is the following:

  1. update the batch table. This can be done manually in the sqlite browser, or via a table.

  2. update the sample table. See inst/parse_samplesheet_2023.R

  3. update the fastq table. See inst/parse_samplesheet_2023.R

  4. update the multiqc, qualimap, rsem and samtools tables. See inst/parse_multiqc.R

  5. update the wgs_compare
